text: Ara smarana karo tomadera upare allah‌ra niyamata ara tamra angikara yara dbara tini tomadera angikarabad'dha karechilena, yakhana tomara balechile -- ''amara sunechi ara amara ajnapalana karachi.’’ Ara allah‌ke bhaya-bhakti karo. Nihsandeha bukera bhitare ya ache allah se-sanbandhe sarbajnata.
